title: Tennis Players Have Fun on Days Off
summary: Carlos Alcaraz is a famous tennis player who is playing in the Australian Open tournament. On his days off from tennis matches, he likes to play golf for fun. He even played golf with another great tennis player, Roger Federer. Alcaraz says Federer is very good at golf, just like he is at tennis. Alcaraz also practices tennis to get better for his next match, but he enjoys golf too. Other players like Coco Gauff also do fun things when they are not playing tennis. This article shows that tennis players have hobbies and relax when they are not competing.

background_read: Tennis is a popular sport played around the world. Players like Carlos Alcaraz compete in big tournaments called Grand Slams, such as the Australian Open. On days when they are not playing matches, athletes often do other activities to relax and have fun, like playing golf or spending time with friends. This helps them stay happy and focused when they return to their sport.
